channel.title: Trolling flaming etc
channel.description:
Hey moparscape staff I have had alot of flaming and trolling done to me lately im h1 sk1ller
Read [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455434.0.html]THIS[/url] thread
and then read [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,455595.0.html]THIS[/url] one
Me and krakkid had a fight on msn, I blocked him "the considerate thing to do" then he just flames me and calls me a leecher.. Then man_killerX jumps in saying that im a shit modeler and that he is way better than me, then he starts that thread creating a model off for dragons, he chose the worst 24 hours for me so I only had around 20mins to complete it.. I get more flame from that saying that it looks like a box with wings etc, ive had enough of this and with more spam after I posted that, CJ steps in and guess who he mutes? Me and I didn't even get a warning "at all" a permanent mute straight there and then, they twisted the truth even made a post called "the saga of h1 sk1ller" trying to troll me more but idc they are the ones that look like dicks, but guess what everyone supports the trollers, and not the people who are kind and even release models, here's some "more" evidence of some e-mails ive been getting from krakkid and it proves it showing his email also
[QUOTE]You do too we all know it mate, good job on getting found out, and everyone took my side because its true and moparscape loves me, not you I didn't even get warned for our little fight, now go back to the world in which everyone hates you.
From: h1sk1ller@hotmail.co.nz To: krackkid@live.com Subject: RE: LOL Date: Thu, 9 Sep 2010 18:45:04 +1200
You don't even fucking know me so don't start shit, me and krakkid had a fight and everyone for some dumbass reason goes on the side of the troll, isn't it a humain action to fight back to a retard like him? Yet you fill and send spam emails to me which does nothing at all, I never leech never will and if I did I wouldn't make or release models for you, and dude I have released models before but guess what then again its the dumbass "leechers" that I have to take it down to, so don't start shit with me or waste my time, I don't spam I reacted which wasn't right because they are only 5 and if your going to side up with them, go do it because I don't have time for it, I won't be on the forums as of now, ill only lol at the work that they have done, you can LOL at this message all you want but im not a leecher, I have dignity now shut up grow up or go to hell..
Sincerely H1 Sk1ller..
From: krackkid@live.com To: h1sk1ller@hotmail.co.nz Subject: LOL Date: Wed, 8 Sep 2010 16:05:27 -0400
Now you can't flame and spam anymore you dumbass leecher.[/QUOTE]
If nothing is done, and the kids don't learn I will leave..

item.title: Trolling flaming etc
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

I’m helping by banning, Do not create multiple accounts

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling flaming etc
item.dc:creator: @donkey7 donkey7
item.description:
@donkey7 wrote:

[QUOTE]And you’re just an idiot. You send a mod a PM cussing and saying shit that’s probably grounding for like flaming, especially to a staff member.

It was also really stupid that you posted this topic, because now you’ll be banned instead of having a mute, that kinda sucks bro. But so does your choices. [/QUOTE]

this is the reason why I hate the forums… Krakkid isn’t a moderator I didn’t pm a moderator at all so stfu, unless your going to help…

And davidi2 I made it before that rule was even there so stfu, I have had enough im just going to give up if no one helps… No one cares im such a nice person but oh well you do what you want, be an asshole to me idc ill just leave then

No krakkid I make models with 3ds max myself retard I don’t use gmax at all and I made the train before I had 3ds so stfu… Im new to 3ds like 2-4 weeks ago…

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling flaming etc
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

LOL you are a whinny bitch ain’t ya? Let me clear up everything for everyone.

It started on msn when I told him that person who he claims leeched a model didn’t really leech it, so he said well prove he didn’t, I said prove he did.(yes kiddie stuff) So then I said well you leeched your fucking train, which comes with Gmax when you download it…he said whats Gmax and since he uses 3ds max(or says he does) I knew then he was lying there for he leeched the model, also he said he could not remake it…

Then in the model section him and man killerx got into it. Man killer then challenged him to a contest to make a dragon I said well give him a site to leech off of then he will enter if not it will be a shit ass model, and it was…his sig said “don’t spam or flame it means you have no life” or something like that, but as well all know thats what he does the most he says it not…but hey he does as you can tell from the “private” email.

So I emailed him saying what I said and now we are here.

P.S. We could of just did this in email instead of bring to moparscape cause now I think I will get warned…and if you wanted to leave just do it you don’t need a topic saying it, the community is what it is, its not going to change for you.

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling flaming etc
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“donkey7, post:3, topic:359464”]I didn’t make another account, ive had this one for ages…[/quote]Read the rules.

Rule 4: We only have one forum account per person, you can use the same account for Moparscape and Moparisthebest.

Read full topic

item.title: Trolling flaming etc
item.dc:creator: @n33bz0rpl0x `Aaron
item.description:
@n33bz0rpl0x wrote:

Davidi2:

Creating multiple accounts to evade punishment is the #1 to get banned.

This.

[quote=“donkey7, post:1, topic:359464”]Hey moparscape staff I have had alot of flaming and trolling done to me lately im h1 sk1ller

Read THIS thread

and then read THIS one

Me and krakkid had a fight on msn, I blocked him “the considerate thing to do” then he just flames me and calls me a leecher… Then man_killerX jumps in saying that im a shit modeler and that he is way better than me, then he starts that thread creating a model off for dragons, he chose the worst 24 hours for me so I only had around 20mins to complete it… I get more flame from that saying that it looks like a box with wings etc, ive had enough of this and with more spam after I posted that, CJ steps in and guess who he mutes? Me and I didn’t even get a warning “at all” a permanent mute straight there and then, they twisted the truth even made a post called “the saga of h1 sk1ller” trying to troll me more but idc they are the ones that look like dicks, but guess what everyone supports the trollers, and not the people who are kind and even release models, here’s some “more” evidence of some e-mails ive been getting from krakkid and it proves it showing his email also

[QUOTE]You do too we all know it mate, good job on getting found out, and everyone took my side because its true and moparscape loves me, not you I didn’t even get warned for our little fight, now go back to the world in which everyone hates you.

From: h1sk1ller@hotmail.co.nz
To: krackkid@live.com
Subject: RE: LOL
Date: Thu, 9 Sep 2010 18:45:04 +1200

You don’t even fucking know me so don’t start shit, me and krakkid had a fight and everyone for some dumbass reason goes on the side of the troll, isn’t it a humain action to fight back to a retard like him? Yet you fill and send spam emails to me which does nothing at all, I never leech never will and if I did I wouldn’t make or release models for you, and dude I have released models before but guess what then again its the dumbass “leechers” that I have to take it down to, so don’t start shit with me or waste my time, I don’t spam I reacted which wasn’t right because they are only 5 and if your going to side up with them, go do it because I don’t have time for it, I won’t be on the forums as of now, ill only lol at the work that they have done, you can LOL at this message all you want but im not a leecher, I have dignity now shut up grow up or go to hell…

Sincerely H1 Sk1ller…

From: krackkid@live.com
To: h1sk1ller@hotmail.co.nz
Subject: LOL
Date: Wed, 8 Sep 2010 16:05:27 -0400

Now you can’t flame and spam anymore you dumbass leecher.[/QUOTE]

If nothing is done, and the kids don’t learn I will leave…[/quote]

And you’re just an idiot. You send a mod a PM cussing and saying shit that’s probably grounding for like flaming, especially to a staff member.

It was also really stupid that you posted this topic, because now you’ll be banned instead of having a mute, that kinda sucks bro. But so does your choices.

@Donkey7, it’s still multiple accounts.

Read full topic
